p: Many relevant and well-known viral agents are involved in the onset of respiratory diseases in hematological patients such as influenza (Flu) and parainfluenza virus (PiV), respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), adenovirus (hAdV), rhinovirus (hRV) and coronavirus (CoV) as well as lesser known ones such as human metapneumovirus (hMPV) and bocavirus (hBoV) [ 2].
